snippet: The new Bravo reality series “Silicon Valley” puts a spotlight, and not necessarily a flattering one, on the technology industry.
abstract: Bravo reality series, tentatively titled Silicon Valley, begins filming its first season and is scheduled to be broadcast this winter; the series, which was in part inspired by The Social Network, 2010 film about the founding of Facebook, shows hard-partying youngsters vying to start companies in a frenzy reminiscent of the dot-com peak of 2000; many people are already disparaging the series.
lead_paragraph: The new Bravo reality series “Silicon Valley” puts a spotlight, and not necessarily a flattering one, on the technology industry.

headline.seo: Silicon Valley Wary of Reality Series
headline.main: A Reality Series Finds Silicon Valley Cringing
headline.print_headline: A Reality Series Intrudes on Silicon Valley, and Finds It Cringing
